quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
And He is with you wherever you are.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
So, truly, with hardship comes ease.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, Allah does not allow the reward of the good-doers to be lost.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
Indeed, Allah loves those who repent.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
quranAyahs.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ
quranAyahs.translation: Perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you.
Indeed, Allah is with us.

quranAyahs.ayah: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
quranAyahs.translation: Say, 'Nothing will happen to us except what Allah has decreed for us.'

quranAyahs.ayah: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
quranAyahs.translation: Whoever relies upon Allah – then He is sufficient for him.
Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
My success is only by Allah.
Indeed, He has always been gracious to me.
My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.
So patience is most fitting.
And rely upon Allah.
Indeed, Allah loves the righteous.
Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

quranAyahs.ayah: لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
quranAyahs.translation: They will have no fear, nor will they grieve.
And who forgives sins except Allah?
Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.
Indeed, my Lord is on a straight path.
Indeed, Allah does not love the transgressors.
Seek help through patience and prayer.
Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدَافِعُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed.
And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you.
Indeed, Allah loves those who purify themselves.
And upon Allah let the believers rely.
Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose.
Indeed, my Lord is Subtle in what He wills.
Indeed, Allah does not love the disbelievers.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ النَّاسَ شَيْئًا
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all.
Allah is the best of providers.
Indeed, Allah is swift in account.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الظَّالِمِينَ
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness.
Indeed, Allah loves the just.
Indeed, Allah does not love the wasteful.

quranAyahs.ayah: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ
quranAyahs.translation: Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.
My Lord, expand for me my chest.
Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Wise.

quranAyahs.ayah: وَمَا النَّصْرُ إِلَّا مِنْ عِندِ اللَّهِ
quranAyahs.translation: And victory is not but from Allah.
Allah is the Protector of those who believe.
